text: Ashley Taylor Gerren (born July 6, 1990) also known as Gerren Taylor, appeared on the BET reality series Baldwin Hills and the documentary America the Beautiful in 2007, which took a critical look at the US’s obsession with beauty. == Early life == Gerren was born in Los Angeles, California. She started modeling when she was twelve years old after being spotted by a talent scout in Los Angeles Park. She was the youngest model ever signed by the runway division of L.A. Models. Taylor also signed with the Ford Modeling Agency and was booked by the designers Tracy Reese, Tommy Hilfiger and Betsey Johnson. ==Acting== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Title !Role |- |2003 |Ripley's Believe it or Not(TV series) |As herself |- |2007 |Baldwin Hills(TV series) |As herself |- |2007 |America the Beautiful(documentary) |As herself |} == References == Category:Living people Category:Female models from California Category:1990 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Gerren Taylor
